me.mcblueparrot.spade.api.entity

Interface DamageableEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandSender, Entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Boat, Vehicle

    public interface DamageableEntity
extends Entity
    Represents an entity that can be damaged.

    • Method Summary

      Damages the entity.
